Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of marchers by stating that there were "more than one MILLION" when news outlets estimated that there were only thousands in attendance.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim of one million marchers.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there were more than one million marchers without providing any evidence or justification for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores alternative explanations and counterclaims that suggest there were only thousands, not millions, of marchers in attendance.
